backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing promotional offers management with CRUD operations for creating, toggling, and updating offers, plus query functions to fetch available offers by operator/amount and apply discount calculations (percentage or cashback).
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON file with no features documented.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of frontend files describing the A2Z Recharge mobile recharge application with promotional offers integration, warm orange/amber branding, and transaction history features.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining light and dark theme color palettes using OKLCH color system with neutral grayscale tones.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for A2Z Recharge application with meta tags and root div for React mounting.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application component managing recharge flow with tabs for recharge form, confirmation view, and transaction history, handling transaction state and applied offers.
frontend/src/components/ConfirmationView: React component displaying successful recharge confirmation with transaction details, applied offer breakdown showing original amount/discount/final amount, and action buttons.
frontend/src/components/OfferCard.tsx: React component rendering individual promotional offer cards with discount display, estimated savings, validity dates, applicable operators, and visual states for best/selected offers.
frontend/src/components/OffersSection.ts: React component displaying a grid of promotional offers with loading/empty states, calculating estimated savings per offer, and handling offer selection.
frontend/src/components/RechargeForm.tsx: React form component for mobile recharge with validation, operator/amount selection, offer application via hooks, and submission handling with loading states.
frontend/src/components/TransactionHisto: Displays a scrollable list of past recharge transactions with status badges, formatting, and empty state messaging.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor based on Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for backend health checks, fetching available promotional offers, and applying offers via the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark theme colors using OKLCH color space and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining custom theme extensions including OKLCH-based color system, typography, animations, and container settings.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking the A2Z Recharge application state with a pending feature request to clarify required changes.
